data.actual_result: The UI of the search function is broken when you are in a dm call
data.expected_result: The text is supposed to have a dark background like in a server search (and like previous builds)
data.short_description: UI while searching in DM Call is broken
data.steps_to_repro: - search something in a server and observe how the background of the text is dark - dm call someone - search something in the dm your call is in - observe
